name: Same!
description:
Same! is a short platformer with the limitations of a Nokia 3310!

The level layout is the same (for the most part) with the obstacles changing location, hence the name.

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Jump

Disclaimer: This game isn't all that special, I made it in about one hour for a jam. Although the jam lasted a week, I was busy doing other things. However, I might consider expanding the game to make it feel like more of a full game! Also, I previously uploaded the HTML5 version, but the sprites scaled very badly so I'm sticking with the executable for now.
